channel.title: U-Rune 6.1.4 Released
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/24vl7c9.png[/img][/center] [center]This server was completely based off of [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369683.0.html]U-Rune server base.[/url] I hope you enjoy this improved version of the server. I worked hard on it.[/center] [center][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,379853.msg2855964.html]If you need a client to use with the server, click this link[/url][/center] Update log
#6.0.1 *Removed Combat class *Removed player saving and loading *Removed misc. junk from the Button class *Removed dialogue mechanics ---- #6.0.2 +WARNING: 50 errors still occur *Removed unused code *Fixed conventions in multiple classes *Removed Special class ---- #6.0.3 +WARNING: Walking does not work, causes exception *Organized variables in the Player class *Removed unused code *Fixed the 50 errors from #0.0.2 *Moved the initialize method back into the Client class ---- #6.0.4 *Walking is now operational *Enabled infinite running *Fixed conventions ---- #6.0.5 *Removed ranged weapon mechanics *Removed unused/useless methods *Removed some NPC spawns *Removed left-over player following code ---- #6.0.6 *Cleaned up the object clicking mechanics *Interfaces are managed in an external class *Started a base on combat ---- #6.0.7 +Glitch: dropping multiples of an item on one spot only allows you to pick up 1 of them *Changed the object clicking mechanics again *Fixed an error with player turning; character was trying to turn to an object that they are standing on caused the client to log the player out *Developed the combat base further *Fixed multiple exceptions in combat ---- #6.0.8 *Fixed the problem with players not facing NPCs during combat *Fixed the problem with NPCs not facing players during combat *Cleaned up npc combat a little bit (this will be further worked on obviously) ---- #6.0.9 *Further improved combat *Split up the attackMonster method into smaller blocks of code *Added attack styles ---- #6.1.0 *Packaged source files *Capped damage on NPCs *Fixed player saving/loading ---- #6.1.1 *Fixed player looks not loading *Fixed attack speeds being incorrect ---- #6.1.2 *Fixed the item pickup bug *Removed some debugging that was left in ---- #6.1.3 *Removed more debugging I left in by accident *Fixed problem with weapons not being enabled on login *Fixed the error with inventory slots not working incorrectly *Fixed bug with dropping items *Fixed server crashes when closing client in the middle of combat *Added a 10 second logout delay in combat ---- #6.1.4 +Sorry about the bugs left in #6.1.3, you may like this version though. *Players take damage *If you create a new account, you will login with 1 in all stats instead of 0 (excluding hitpoints) *Attack styles saves and loads between logins *On death: you teleport to lumbridge and face south *You gain ranged and hitpoints experience when using a ranged weapon *Weapon attack styles switch if they don't exist on the weapon equipped *Fixed a bug with player positioning *Screen brightness saves and loads between logins (dark is default if new account is created) *You stop facing an NPC if you click it and walk away *Enabled one connection per-IP address *Added a debugging system (you can enable/disable debugging via ::debug command)
For help navigating around U-Rune folder;
+Here is some documentation each package inside the U-Rune folder. +If you still have trouble navigating through the folder, I'm sorry I can't help any more. @Documentation written by Kihomura of http://www.moparisthebest.com KEY * = folder/package # = main folder @ = author + = notation #BIN *char - characters *class - compiled class files *conf - configuration files (item.cfg, autospawn.cfg, etc) *data - data (notes.dat, sellable.dat, stackable.dat, etc.) *doc - documents (lists; NPC IDs, item IDs, etc.) *log - logs (banned users, IP-banned users, etc) #CMD build.bat - compile all class files using this (may need to change JDK version) run.bat - run the server using this (you shouldn't need to change anything) #SRC Client.java - some of the server mechanics Player.java - player functions Server.java - the core of the server *misc - class files that don't fall under object, npc, or player (Misc class, Stream class, Cryption class, etc) *mechanics - the mechanics of certain things on the server (banking, shopping, etc) *npc - NPC related class files (NPCHandler class, etc) *object - object related class files (Object class) *player - player related class files (PlayerHandler class) *item - item class files *packet - class files related to packets *profile - user profile + I hope this helped you to some extent, enjoy the server <3
And for the people that love those pictures/video. <3 [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/29c515g.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/15qu1q1.gif[/img] [url=http://uppit.com/v/XCM9IM47]Download the server (250kb) Link 1[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/1X3SNHR4]Download the server (250kb) Link 2[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/VBAEEQWG]Download the server (250kb) Link 3[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/079BLO37]Download the server (250kb) Link 4[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/mdr101sh]Download the lists (Coordinates, NPC IDs, etc) (130kb)[/url] Thank you, I love you guys <33

I must ask, where is the Special.java, it should have already been added in.
[/quote]

If you didn’t already know this is an F2P based server, so there are no special attacks.[/quote] Yeah, he just told me I was like :(, but whatever I’ll see what I can do to add it. If not I’ll beg to Mergim to add it for me
